summary: Large fortress with everything you need and more.
descriptionHtml:
not eveything shown in pictures.

NOTE: you must discover it first. you can find a trapdoor leading to long stairs that lead you to the keep. Map marker near Bleakfall barrow.

-----FEATURES------

-NPCS-

-3 servants
-about 6 guards, 3 outside 3 inside + personal little higher level guard.
-blacksmith (making it a trainer in the future)
-librarian (making it a alchemy trainer in future
-chef
-2 torture victims

-ROOMS-

-entrance 
-dining room 
-library, \"alchemy and enchanting room\" + very small ingredient room
-blacksmith room + armory + very small training room
-dovahkiins personal quarters which includes 2 medium sized rooms + one of my personal favourites, the vault 

-OTHER, MISCELANOUS OR USEFUL-

-IN VAULT-

-treasures, including: coinpurses,ingots and other stuff, but not too much that you could consider it as a cheat mod. 
-and my favourite, display cased static dragon claws + dragon priest.

-IN THE BLACKSMITH

-small amount of ingots
-forge
-workbench
-average sized armory with weaponracks and few display cases

-LIBRARY-

-high amount of books
-enchanting and alchemy table
-ingredients
-miscelanous items

-ENTRANCE-

-nothing special, just detailed clutter

-DINING ROOM-

-high amount of food to cook
-cooking facilities
-miscelanous stuff

-DOVAHKIINS PERSONAL QUARTERS-

-not much to say, except alchemy table and detailed clutter

-KNOWN BUGS-

there are some \"flashing\" on some walls
full navmesh excepts but not companion friendly

-COMPATIBILY- (is it the right word? lol)

- once i finished it i browsed steam workshop and nexus for possible incompabilities and notices that Kaldar Keep isnt compatible.

-CREDITS-
me, and some resources around the internet






- i would really appreciate better pictures :)
author: 1 inch punch
